body_html:
@Carmezim Thanks i found out the problems
1)path variables should have a extra \bin at the end
2)the cuda version should have been 6
3)in path variable there should be have been and extra C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\cuda\bin

body:
@Carmezim Thanks i found out the problems 
1)path variables should have a extra \bin at the end
2)the cuda version should have been 6
3)in path variable there should be have been and extra C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v8.0\cuda\bin
